entries.title: Monetary Policy Framework | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: DAB employs a framework of targeting monetary variables in the formulation, adoption, and implementation of its monetary policy. Within this framework, DAB utilizes monetary policy instruments to manage the money supply and liquidity conditions in the economy. Managing liquidity conditions is crucial for the ...

entries.title: Monetary Policy Directorate General | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: The Monetary Policy Directorate General is one of the key directorates of Da Afghanistan Bank bearing the responsibility of formulating, adopting, and implementing the country's monetary and foreign exchange policies. Adhering to the monetary variable targeting framework, the Monetary Policy Directorate General ...

entries.title: Monetary Policy Formulation and Implementation
entries.text: The monetary policy of the central bank is formulated and adopted through the Monetary Policy Committee. The committee consists of the DAB governor, the first deputy governor, and other members of the Supreme Council. The chairman of this committee is the Governor of DAB with the first deputy governor serving as ...

entries.title: All News | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: June 3, 2025 – Sediqullah Khalid, the first deputy governor of Da Afghanistan Bank, officially reopened the Afghanistan Institute of Banking and Finance (AIBF).
